title: BOARDING ACTION
content: In patch 1.2.8 along with 2 new classes appears a new game mode – Boarding Action, on the board of the frigate Maccrage's Fury.

title: NEW MAPS
content: Completely new map is now available – Railgate Ravine. Along with it, Olipsis Refinery now appears in ECR.

title: VETERAN SYSTEM
content: Now you can exchange received XP for spawning as Veterans on the battle field.

title: FIRST DEDICATED SERVERS (RU, EU)
content: We created first dedicated servers in Russia (Moscow) and Europe (Frankfurt). They will be available during planned game events.

title: WELCOME BACK, CRUSADERS
content: On May 28, 2023, one and a half year after the game shutdown, Eternal Crusade: Resurrection is finally available for everyone.

title: ECR OPEN ALPHA TRAILER IS LIVE
content: The trailer of Eternal Crusade: Resurrection alpha is available on YouTube.
